text: Women are individuals in parenting, and why not?
author: Erica Jong

text: While not impossible, it is especially challenging for teenage parents to develop bonds with their children. A high percent of them were themselves children of teenage parents and have never experienced appropriate parenting.
author: Jane Fonda

text: No, I've never wanted kids. But I do read about parenting a lot.
author: Fiona Apple

text: I'm trying to break any chain of negative parenting that I might have survived.
author: Eddie Vedder

text: My grandmother was a kind of Scarsdale, New York, society woman, best known in her day as the author of the 1959 book 'Growing Your Own Way: An Informal Guide for Teen-Agers' - this despite being a person whose parenting style made Joan Crawford's wire hangers look like pool noodles.
author: Sloane Crosley
